title: If you went on a date with your most used champion...
body:
How would it go? Where would you go? What would you do?

Sexual orientation aside, I feel like {{champion:25}} wouldn't be hard to take a stroll around the park with, as I notice the grass wither to a state of rapid necrosis... Maybe dinner  but its possible when getting to the dessert parts she might complain about it and state how much better her baking is. But overall I don't see serious problems.

replies.body: {{champion:267}}  and I are going to take a sweet trip to the beach.
{{champion:143}} ,umm? Vegetarian pizza?
YOU WOULD EAT HER PLANTS YOU SICK PERSON
I think you would make the best hentai ever together.
If I was drinking something I would have spit it out in laughter at this comment.
lol {{champion:268}}  I guess I would just ascend :D
Oh, he'll make you ascend alright. lol

> [{quoted}](name=ChimeiTekinaNasu,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=XIVNhAzj,comment-id=001b0000,timestamp=2015-01-07T15:57:09.244+0000)
>
> Oh, he'll make you ascend alright. lol

This XD
Hold on, let me play Sona a few more times....Don't want to date Mordekaiser
{{champion:412}} You could say we are soul mates...

{{champion:102}} =
It would be awkward as f*ck. I wouldn't know where to take her or what to talk about with her. During the entire date I would be having the same thought running through my mind over and over. "How the hell did her father end up with a human?"

I'm going to have an OK date.

{{champion:33}}

{{champion:119}} 

Screw me, I'm not going on a date, I'm just holding a mirror.

I think it would be awkward to date {{champion:133}} with Valor looming over us the whole time.

(p.s. we need a Valor champ icon for the forums!)
agreed
OMG, I'M DYING. LOL
My date would drug my meal and try to turn me into a robot{{champion:112}}

I gotta say, I was very disappointed with the {{champion:143}} date.

I mean, she was pleasant company at first, but I began thinking this was a bad idea when we went to the restaurant. It was already hard enough convincing the owner to let us in with how Zyra ''dresses'', but he tought we where mocking him when she ordered every single meal that contained meat. Twice.

We barely avoided getting thrown out like thieves by having me pay up-front for everything. (I'm not sure i'll be able to pay the rent this month. She sure has a crazy appetite.) It was fairly humiliating to have all the patrons look at us the way they did, I can tell you that, so I was relieved when she FINALLY finished gulping on everything.

Afterwards, we went to the cinema. She insisted on watching some two hours long, sappy romance movie. She fell asleep during the ads, so I had to suffer through the whole movie alone, and since I was absolutely unable to wake her up, I had to carry her outside at the end.

At this point there was still some sunlight, so I suggested to go for a walk in the park. She enthusiastically accepted. I thought this would be a nice occasion to finally get to be alone together, peacefully.

Boy, was I wrong.

Turns out, her friends where all over the place, and she'd stop to talk to every single flowers and trees of the park. Need I tell you that was extremely awkward, and not exactly what I was planning for? I managed to keep my cool, though, and not let my rage out, up until the point where she started to hit on the big oak and get all up in his business.

Plant-women are all the same. They might say that they love you, but once they go bark, they never go back.

{{champion:54}} 

I'm honestly not sure... Does he eat? Enjoy comedy? Music?
He likes to rock, and craves those minerals
so you're telling me malphite is a cannibal
"Craves" doesn't always imply hunger

{{champion:55}} "So I went ahead and took care of all the woman at your work", as she smiles with excitement.

Me - "Wait, what do you mean took care of?" I ask as I'm certainty worried.

{{champion:55}} "Did I stutter?", she quickly remarks with a glare.

Me - ...

{{champion:92}} 

I guess we could go see a blacksmith?

Hm....lets see...drink some grog, check. Plunder anything that looks like it has high value. And run around yelling at people, " ARGH SURRENDER THE BOOTY!!!". seams like the begging of a goooooooooood bromance. {{champion:41}}

{{champion:12}} 

I think I am going to have to get really drunk and then walk around funny for the rest of my life.
{{champion:103}} We'd go straight to the bedroom and I'd pray that she won't kill me afterwards.
She doesn't do that anymore.

{{champion:45}} 

I'm just going to avoid making any short jokes.
{{champion:99}} I'm not a lesbian but whatever. Babe, I wanna taste your rainbow. And yes it is meant to sound dirty.
Find the rainbow, taste the rainbow.
{{champion:28}} In for a painful, yet arousing night.  Hopefully I can live through it.
My date would be {{champion:37}} , and I dont have to tell you whats going to happen

Yeah, it'll be really awkward since you prolly don't understand sign language, not to mention that she's a highly successful classical musician, an aristocrat (hoo boy is that gonna be expensive) and has an instrument that wants to kill you... :P

{{champion:222}}  is mine

I have a feeling we'd do a lot of off color things, and something nice & relaxing like watching Vi & firefighter tristana try to quell the flames of a city burning to the ground

I would have sex with her. Wait...
{{champion:1}}  OH MY GOD IM A PEDOPHILE
{{champion:113}} She's leaving the pig behind right?
Sorry. I don't think you can get rid of Sej. that easily. ;p

Well I've played a TON of {{champion:99}} , and I think that date would go fine so long as I don't make her laugh TOO much and drive myself insane.  She'd make a cute gf.

Lately however, I've been playing a lot of {{champion:80}} ,  For some reason I don't see that going as well.  If I don't compliment his scones he's going to impale me on a spear and kick me into a well.
go to brazil with {{champion:82}}
{{champion:53}}  He gets REALLY handsy REALLY fast. It's actually quite electrifying ;)

hot gay orgy with udyr ? ;l
not everyone plays a female champ 
-sobs-
{{champion:254}} ... Itll go fine until we hold hands, then the ambulance
Well I'm from PR so I said I take {{champion:89}} to one of the most beautiful beach there is in my country; after all she is a radiant sun. xD

{{champion:122}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:92}} 

Let's go smash some Demacian.
{{champion:10}}  and i would go out to a movie. some moral dilemma from the plot would spark her interest, leading to a philosophical debate. she would then promptly condemn me to the afterlife.
